alert.note: Alert for Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 1:20PM EDT until June 26 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL LEBANON AND SOUTHEASTERN SCHUYLKILL COUNTIES... At 120 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fredericksburg, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Schuylkill Haven, Myerstown, Orwigsburg, Sand Hill, Pine Grove, Cleona, Fredericksburg, Friedensburg, Renningers, McKeansburg and Lickdale. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 78 from mile markers 1 to 8. Interstate 81 between mile markers 90 and 92, and from mile markers 94 to 104. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
